Sentencas: Coal-fueled direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell (DC-SOFC) is a very attractive electrochemical conversion device.
Titulo: Anthracite pretreatment for high-performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell-A green pathway for power generation

Sentencas: However, coal contains a certain amount of ash, such as Al, Si, S, etc., which are toxicants for SOFC components.
Titulo: Anthracite pretreatment for high-performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell-A green pathway for power generation

Sentencas: To solve the above problem, anthracite is pyrolyzed at 600 degrees C to obtain semi-coking coal results in better cell performance.
Titulo: Anthracite pretreatment for high-performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell-A green pathway for power generation

Sentencas: The results show that the higher carbon gasification oxidation activity of semi-coking coal is due to the higher amount of fixed carbon and catalyst.
Titulo: Anthracite pretreatment for high-performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell-A green pathway for power generation

Sentencas: Therefore, more fuel gas (CO) is available in the anode chamber for the Boudouard reaction.
Titulo: Anthracite pretreatment for high-performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell-A green pathway for power generation

Sentencas: Also, the electrochemical performance of both coals as DC-SOFC fuel was compared using La0.4Sr0.6Co0.2Fe0.7Nb0.1O3-d (LSCFN) as anode.
Titulo: Anthracite pretreatment for high-performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell-A green pathway for power generation

Sentencas: The maximum power density (MPD) of the DC-SOFC with semi-coking coal is 596 mW cm-2 at 850 degrees C, much higher than that of the SOFC using anthracite (396 mW cm-2) as the fuel.
Titulo: Anthracite pretreatment for high-performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell-A green pathway for power generation

Sentencas: Furthermore, at the same fuel content, the cell fueled with semi-coking coal has a longer discharge time (30 h), which shows a better stability.(c) 2023
Titulo: Anthracite pretreatment for high-performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell-A green pathway for power generation
